description: 帮朋友做的Windows的Prometheus监控看板展示，使用windows_exporter 0.7.0+，需要的同学可以试试。

targets.expr: (sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$server"}) by (instance) - sum(windows_logical_disk_free_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$server"}) by (instance)) / sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$server"}) by (instance) * 100

title: 3 windows_exporter 0.7.0+ for Prometheus 监控展示看板（windows监控）
